name: Mop's Tower
description:
A game by Eric Merz (mokkograd.net) with music by mbbmbbmm (grav-modulo.com)

Story:

There isn't much that we know about Mop's Tower, aside from its name.

We don't know who built, we don't know its age, we don't even know why it's called Mop's Tower.

People tell the story that, whoever manages to survive the challenges of the tower and reaches its top will get whatever they desire the most in their lifes.

You always felt, like you were meant to do something extraordinary in your life.

You will be the one who endures the tower's challenges and uncover its tightly guarded secrets.

Your friends have decided to support you in your efforts. With their help, you will succeed where everyone else has failed.


Controls:

Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move around

S - jump

A - dash

D - Glide

F - Fire

P - reset to last checkpoint

esc to enter menu

Gamepad (xbox 360 controller)

dpad or analogue stick to move around

A-jump

B-Fire

X-Glide

right trigger - dash

start to enter menu
